name: getRoot
description: Get links to all other resources available in the API.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

exclude_fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to exclude. Reference parameters of sub-objects with dot notation.

$block: The API root resource links to all other resources available in the API.

$ul: **_links**: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.
**account_id**: The Mailchimp account ID.
**account_industry**: The user-specified industry associated with the account.
**account_name**: The name of the account.
**account_timezone**: The timezone currently set for the account.
**avatar_url**: URL of the avatar for the user.
**contact**: Information about the account contact.
**addr1**: The street address for the account contact.
**addr2**: The street address for the account contact.
**city**: The city for the account contact.
**company**: The company name for the account.
**country**: The country for the account contact.
**state**: The state for the account contact.
**zip**: The zip code for the account contact.
**email**: The account email address.
**first_name**: The first name tied to the account.
**first_payment**: Date of first payment for monthly plans.

**industry_stats**: The [average campaign statistics](https://mailchimp.com/resources/research/email-marketing-benchmarks/?utm_source=mc-api&utm_medium=docs&utm_campaign=apidocs) for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.
**bounce_rate**: The average bounce rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.
**click_rate**: The average unique click rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.
**open_rate**: The average unique open rate for all campaigns in the account's specified industry.
**last_login**: The date and time of the last login for this account in ISO 8601 format.
**last_name**: The last name tied to the account.
**login_id**: The ID associated with the user who owns this API key. If you can login to multiple accounts, this ID will be the same for each account.
**member_since**: The date and time that the account was created in ISO 8601 format.
**pricing_plan_type**: The type of pricing plan the account is on.
**pro_enabled**: Legacy - whether the account includes [Mailchimp Pro](https://mailchimp.com/help/about-mailchimp-pro/).
**role**: The [user role](https://mailchimp.com/help/manage-user-levels-in-your-account/) for the account.
**total_subscribers**: The total number of subscribers across all lists in the account.
**username**: The username tied to the account.

$block: An error generated by the Mailchimp API. Conforms to IETF draft 'draft-nottingham-http-problem-06'.

$ul: **detail**: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem. [Learn more about errors](/developer/guides/get-started-with-mailchimp-api-3/#Errors).
**instance**: A string that identifies this specific occurrence of the problem. Please provide this ID when contacting support.
**status**: The HTTP status code (RFC2616, Section 6) generated by the origin server for this occurrence of the problem.
**title**: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type. It shouldn't change based on the occurrence of the problem, except for purposes of localization.
**type**: An absolute URI that identifies the problem type. When dereferenced, it should provide human-readable documentation for the problem type.
